Each flaxen lock a rush of flowing gold
Her bill the color of summer sunset

action: <mark>OVERLY CAUTIOUS</mark> While this character has no damage, he gets +2 ◆.
flavour: “You , there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor.”

name: Chien-Po
title: Imperial Soldier
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must chose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Donald Duck
title: Buccaneer
action: <mark>BOARDING PARTY</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 ◆ this turn.
flavour: Nobody stands a chance against the daring duck of the high seas!

name: Lefou
title: Opportunistic Flunky
action: <mark>I LEARNED FROM THE BEST</mark> During your turn, you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

name: Ling
title: Imperial Soldier
action: <mark>FULL OF SPIRIT</mark> Your Hero characters get +1 ※.
flavour: A good friend is handy in a fight.

name: Lusia Madrigal
title: Rock of the Family
action: <mark>I'M THE STRONG ONE</mark> While you have another character in play, this character gets +2 ※.
flavour: There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey.

name: Magic Broom
title: Aerial Cleaner
action: WINGED FOR A DAY During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavour: It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean.

name: Magic Broom
title: Brigade Captain
action:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
ARMY OF BROOMS This character gets +1 ※ for each other Broom character you have in play.

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Playful Sorcerer
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
SWEEP AWAY When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Flagbearer
action: BE STRONG When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 ※ while challenging.)
flavour: It is the benchmark for intrepid adventurers around the world.

name: Philoctetes
title: No-Nonsense Instructor
action:
YOU GOTTA STAY FOCUSED Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 ※ while challenging.)
SHAMELESS PROMOTER Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

name: Rajah
title: Royal Protector
action: <mark>STEADY GAZE</mark> While you have no cards in your hand, characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge this character.
flavour: As regal as his namesake and just as powerful.

name: I Find ’em, I Flatten ’em
action:
(A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Banish all items.
flavour: All the most difficult missions are for me, because I am indestructible.

name: One Last Hope
action:
(A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. If a Hero character is chosen, they may also challenge ready characters this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: The Mob Song
action:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your of your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Deal 3 damage to up to 3 chosen characters and/or locations.

name: Imperial Bow
action: WITHIN RANGE ↷, 1 ⬡ − Chosen Hero character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive this turn. (They get +2 ※ while challenging. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: RLS Legacy's Cannon
action: <mark>BA-BOOM!</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡, Discard a card - Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.
flavour:
“So help me, I'll use the ship's cannons to blast ya all to kingdom come!”
−John Silver

name: The Wall
title: Border Fortress
action: <mark>PROTECT THE REALM</mark> While you have an exerted character here, your other locations can't be challenged.

name: Thebes
title: The Big Olive
action: <mark>IF YOU CAN MAKE IT HERE...</mark> During your turn, whenever a character banishes another character in a challenge while here, you gain 2 lore.

name: Cinderella
title: Melody Weaver
action:
Singer 9 (This character counts as cost 9 to sing songs.)
BEAUTIFUL VOICE Whenever this character sings a song, your other Princess characters get +1 ◆ this turn.

name: Minnie Mouse
title: Musketeer Champion
action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
DRAMATIC ENTRANCE When you play this character banish chosen opponent character with 5 ※ or more.

name: Ursula
title: Sea Witch Queen
action:
Shift 5 You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
NOW I'M THE RULER Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character.
YOU'LL LISTEN TO ME! Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

name: Yen Sid
title: Powerful Sorcerer
action:
TIMELY INTERVENTION When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card.
ARCANE STUDY While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2 ◆.

name: Second Star to the Right
action:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Chosen player draws 5 cards.

name: Diablo
title: Devoted Herald
action:
Shift: Discard an action card (You may discard an action card to play this on top of one of your characters named Diablo.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CIRCLE FAR AND WIDE During each opponent's turn, whenever they draw a card while this character is exerted, you may draw a card.

name: Jasmine
title: Desert Warrior
action: <mark>SMART MANEUVER</mark> When you play this character and each time she is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

name: We Don't Talk About Bruno
action:
(A character with cost 5 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character to their player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

name: Goofy
title: Super Goof
action:
Rush (This characer can challenge the turn they're played.)
SUPER PEANUT POWERS Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 2 lore.

name: The Queen
title: Diviner
action: <mark>CONSULT THE SPELLBOOK</mark> ↷ – Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item card costs 3 or less, you may play it for free and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
STRAIGHT SHOOTER When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, she gets +3 ※ this turn.
TRIPPLE SHOT During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.
